Class FinderModelSearch

[line 27]
JModelList
   |
   --FinderModelSearch
Location: /com_finder/models/search.php

Remarks

Search model class for the Finder package.

since

2.5

Class Variable Summary

  • $context =  'com_finder.search'
    Context string for the model type
  • $excludedTerms = array()
    An array of all excluded terms ids.
  • $includedTerms = array()
    An array of all included terms ids.
  • $query =
    The query object is an instance of FinderIndexerQuery which contains and models the entire search query including the text input; static and dynamic taxonomy filters; date filters; etc.
  • $requiredTerms = array()
    An array of all required terms ids.

    FinderModelSearch::getStoreId

    getStoreId( [string $id = ''], [boolean $page = true] );

    Parameters

    $id

    An identifier string to generate the store id. [optional]

    $page

    True to store the data paged, false to store all data. [optional]

    Returns

    A store id.

    Remarks

    Method to get a store id based on model the configuration state.

    This is necessary because the model is used by the component and different modules that might need different sets of data or different ordering requirements.

    since

    2.5

    access

    protected
